newsitem.title: USA: CBOT rice ends mixed, upside checked by hedges.
newsitem.headline: CBOT rice ends mixed, upside checked by hedges.

text.p: CBOT rice futures closed mixed as the market remained rangebound, with upside potential persistently checked by hedge selling, traders said.
"Holding the market in check is farmer movement. Elevators are going long the basis, buying rice from farmers and selling the board," a trader said.
Rice futures volume was estimated by the CBOT at 300 contracts, above the 176 traded Monday.
Rice closed one cent per cwt higher to one lower, with January up one at $10.47 per cwt.
